channel.title: Devlogs on Day Trader Tycoon
channel.description: Recent content in Devlogs on Day Trader Tycoon

item.title: DevLog 002 - 2024-06-07
item.description: Added the ability to better control stock volatility throughout the day. Until now, I had one seed for each day that controlled the random movements of the stocks, usually giving a small trend upwards or downwards for each day. I recently added the ability to change the direction of the stocks for specific hours, allowing me to provide story elements that relate to the full story. In the image, you can see “extreme” changes in the random movements of stocks.

item.title: DevLog 001 - 2024-06-03
item.description: I’ve been working on a small game named Day Trader Tycoon as a side project for the past few months, and I think it’s in a good-enough state for me to post about it. To set the stage, here is a screenshot of the game: The main setting of the game is that the player works in a pension fund, and they day-trade with people’s pension money. The game aims to be a parody of the stock market, with a combination of a linear story and many different random events.
